ygData.subject: RE: level hell
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah, only to my bard friends do I release this info, but there s a troll out in the OOT that you can solo around 24 or so.  May need to take one person, he ll
ygData.messageBody:
Ah, only to my bard friends do I release this info,
but there's a troll out in the OOT that you can solo
around 24 or so. May need to take one person, he'll
be on one of the rocks around the sirens. He got me
over the mid-20's slump. Unlike herman the hermit, I
never once got there and found him camped, and the
boat passes quite nearby to catch for a ride back to
FP. Hope that helps you get to the upper 20's anyway.
:)

Llewrend Lynnhaven
